author: A_Brickset_user
title: 2nd best LEGO Island Extreme Stunts Set.......................................................................
review:
Yup. It rules! THE Trailer's lights go down to stabalize it, It's side ramps can carry the trikes, The cab of the car is HUGE! Its NOT JUNIORIZED... At all. It's a little unfair that the brickster has the chrome tailpipes. I think that's the Brickster cheating by putting 'em on. The flags on the back of the trikes are a nice touch. I don't really like the new 'Stunt Trikes', BUt these are an exception. These rule.

P.S. Arn't you tired of me? I won't go away!

author: hustla187
title: Like the Trikes and the Minifigs
review: This is a great set to get. You get Pepper, Brickster, and Pepper's girlfriend whose name I forgot. I like the trikes and they are very cool espiecially the tailpipes. The truck is not juniorized which I like, but is a little big. This is a set you have to get!

author: clone_commander_trainrex
title: Great truck
review: This truck is so cool.  There is a motor inside the fromt and lots of cab space.  It also has opening doors and two awesome trikes one with chromed turbo boposters.  Them ther is a trailer with opening sides and 3 people.  A bad guy, a driver, and a girl.  Overall it is cool so get it.

author: cbowers
title: WOW HUGE TRUCK!
review:
I usually would never stoop this low. But here goes.

 

Pros:

There are some minifigs.

The color orange.

Tri-bikes

The truck cab is decent.

 

Cons:

Size: Do we really need a truck this big to carry two trikes?

This theme crashed and burned. This was this themes worst set. IMO

Well besides the skate park. That was almost pointless.

If you like this set, then you should check out the plane, boat and base and lifeguard house. Those are the good-uns. This was my only substitute for city in the dark ages.

Okay, so the truck bed is one giant useless piece.

Those neon lights...

mini-figs are boring.

This doesnt fit on any roadplates and doesn't belong in a city.

author: alexfig8
title: one word: WOW!
review:
I got this off ebay a couple months ago and let me tell you it was so worth the price! so here are the pros and cons
    
pros:
    huge truck
    stunt trikes
   trailer becomes a stunt ramp
   pepper 
   brickster
    sky lane
     chrome pieces

         cons: 
           none

author: epiclegoman
title: Very Cool set!
review:
Just got this set a few days ago with a majority of the other Lego Island Extreme stunts I purchased in a bundle. This set is very cool, They don't make sets like this anymore I honestly wish I had sets like this when I was younger, but the time had come. Set was worth it for sure, for a kid this would be fun to play with and to build. I thought the trailer was a pretty cool piece never seen anything like it before. Overall the Lego set is Awesome! and super fun!

Not great with reviews, as the time of this review I didn't have much knowledge of how to create excellent reviews.
